name: orbit traveler
description:
A small shooting star travels orbits to find a place to rest.

avoids black hole, pass through star dust to absorb dusts.

when you entered orbit, your body burns, get smaller.

Be careful to be not disappeared by burnt.

Submitted Weekly Game Jam - Week 135

Theme : Shooting Stars

Controll

Space : Game start, (on Orbit) Go outside orbit.
